description: Liverpool 4-0 Leicester: Jurgen Klopp's busy Sunday
title: Liverpool 4-0 Leicester: Jurgen Klopp's busy Sunday
title_page: Liverpool 4-0 Leicester: Jurgen Klopp's busy Sunday - BBC Sport
maintext:
Jurgen Klopp oversaw a 4-0 win over Leicester and a game in which he made 13 substitutions.
If that wasn't work enough, he became a cheerleader in the aftermath, taking selfies for fans and offering up autographs in addition.
